snippet.title: Black Mesa Military 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills. You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the H.E.C.U and even see Gordon Freeman in person.

You can also check the moddb page of the modification here: [https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-military]

Or steam workshop: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1720191293&searchtext=
